name: CodVenture
description:
Create with Paul-Adrien Melon, Justin Dadar and Mathieu Laval

Block information

The block sequence is a block that can contain any type of block and throw them with a spawn point for the blocks that can spawn

The number block is a block where all the blocks inside will repeat the number of times of the number

The block N is a block where if it is in a number block it will repeat all that it contains the number of times that the number block has made iteration

The arrow block is a block that will move the spawn point of the blocks that can spawn ( wood Box )
